Package org.bluezoo.gumdrop.servlet.jsp

Class StandardActionElement

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.bluezoo.gumdrop.servlet.jsp.StandardActionElement
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    JSPElement
    public class StandardActionElement
extends java.lang.Object
implements JSPElement
    Represents a JSP standard action element.

    Standard actions are predefined JSP elements that provide common functionality. They use the "jsp:" prefix and include actions like:

    • <jsp:include> - Include another resource
    • <jsp:forward> - Forward to another resource
    • <jsp:useBean> - Use a JavaBean
    • <jsp:setProperty> - Set bean property
    • <jsp:getProperty> - Get bean property

    Example standard actions: 

     <jsp:include page="header.jsp"/>
 <jsp:useBean id="user" class="com.example.User" scope="session"/>
 <jsp:setProperty name="user" property="name" value="John"/>
    Author:
    Chris Burdess
